title: Forgotten password and misspelled email address
body:
So I wanted to change my password and I did but when I tried to log in, it didn't work so I thought I clicked an extra key but idk what it is and so i clicked the forgot password link and waited for the email but I never got it so I checked my email address on my account and noticed that is was missing a letter, then i tried to change my email address but you needed the current password which i didn't know so idk what to do now. I also spent a lot of money on that account so i really need help. 

(Btw i tried to send a ticket with all the detail i could put but it said i need more info)

replies.body:
I'm sorry to hear about the trouble you're having getting into your account. In order to get this sorted out, you'll want to try [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) again and fill out as much information as you can in the recovery form. The more information that is provided, the faster our specialists can take care of this for you.

Let me know if you have any questions.

when i tried to submit a ticket, it's asking for my email address which is missing a letter and can you guys please change when you change your password, because it asks for my current password which i forgot, so you guys should take out the current password thing and if you do that, then i could change my password and i could also change my email address with my new password and i could receive the link to the forgotten password thing. I hope you guys do it :)

Simply fill out the required fields with what info you remember and an account specialist will get back to you. You can make any specific requests you have once our specialists get back to you.

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
i'm not sure what other info to put :/
